actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To provide student loan forgiveness to health care workers who are on the frontline in response to COVID-19.
short_title: Frontline Health Care Worker Student Loan Assistance Act of 2020
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
